Name: Comet Crusher: Block Breaker
About the game: While exploring deep space, you have come across our solar system. It is up to you to crush each layer of every planet in our solar system in this beautiful block breaker. See if you can complete each set of levels corresponding to each planet in order to unlock the next. If you lose all of your lives, you will have to start back at the beginning of the last planet you completed. But worry not! There are many powerups to help you on your journey! 45 unique levels! More than 10 different powerup drops! Variation between the blocks of each level in both art and function! Save and pick back up on the planet where you left off!
